references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces the Swin-MMDiT architecture, a key component of SeedVR, which uses window attention to enhance efficiency and handle arbitrary resolutions.

references.paper_title: SwinIR: Image restoration using swin transformer
references.reason: This paper introduces the Swin Transformer architecture which is adapted and extended in SeedVR to improve video restoration performance.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This work is relevant due to its focus on scaling diffusion models for videos, an aspect central to SeedVR's design and training strategy.
This paper is highly relevant as it proposes a video restoration transformer, showcasing the state-of-the-art in diffusion-based video restoration approaches which SeedVR builds upon.

references.paper_title: Venhancer: Generative space-time enhancement for video generation
references.reason: This paper is among the most important because it focuses on generative video restoration, a field directly related to SeedVR and provides a strong baseline for comparison.
